author: clefru
content: It feels like that there should be a general "testnet controller" project in which you can -- completely dockerized -- bring up as many as diverse clients as you want and have them talk to each other. Maybe add a load generator, and some monitoring tools like forkmon. Does such a project exist for ETH2?
